titleStmt.title: An exclamation against the whore of Babylon the mother of harlots setting forth the true and false church with their heads, members, parts, and properties, as any indifferent reader, Protestant or papist, may judge which is the one, which is the other : who are Christs who be antichrists, who be true Christians and who be antichristians : as the difference and also the opposition now here following fully declareth.
Bible. N.T. Revelation. English. Selections.

notesStmt.note: Text consists of Bible passages relating to "the true church" and "the false church" in parallel columns.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
